about_the_game:
A classic visual novel about a demon-slaying ninja.

CHARACTER


Asagi Igawa (Voice: Hina Nakase)

This story's protagonist. The game takes place from her perspective.
Asagi is a Taimanin, a female ninja sworn to bury inhuman evils in the dark from which they rise. She is hailed as the strongest of all the Taimanin due to her genius for swordplay and martial arts, her unbelievable speed, and a string of accomplishments that speak for themselves.


Sakura Igawa (Voice: Nana Aikawa)

Our heroine Asagi's younger sister is vivacious, beautiful, and often competitive, but has a certain soft spot for Asagi herself. Her genetics give her the potential to be a deadly ninja like her elder sister. However, in terms of practical ability, she's only an apprentice for now.
She yearns to put her natural talents to work for the greater good as a Taimanin, a future that Asagi is staunchly against. Sakura has nonetheless been pursuing her training in secret.

STORY


Tokyo is infested with demons, creatures of darkness and corruption. By ancient unspoken agreement, humans and these dark beings have always held themselves apart—until man's depravity began to break down the barriers. At present, humans and demons collude to form gangs and corporations.

Though evil may be on the rise, those who still choose to walk the righteous path are far from powerless. The government has formed the Taimanin, a group of ninjas who, while human, possess the strength to fight such nefarious foes.

Asagi Igawa is the strongest of these elites, but after one last mission against Oboro—the fallen ninja leader of the Oboro Ninja Troop—she plans to retire from her years of service to marry her lover Kyousuke Sawaki.

Yet her duty may not yet be done with Asagi, as her nemesis creeps back from the dead to seek vengeance...

content_descriptors.notes: Contains violence, crude language, and cursing. All characters are over the age of 18.

name: Taimanin Asagi

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10\11
  • Processor: Intel Celeron
  • Memory: 64 MB RAM
  • Graphics: >16MB
  • DirectX: Version 7.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10\11
  • Processor: PentiumIII 500MHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: >16MB
  • DirectX: Version 7.0
  • Storage: 240 MB available space

short_description: A classic visual novel about a demon-slaying ninja. Asagi was the strongest Taimanin in Tokyo, but after completing her last mission, she just wants to settle down and marry her lover Kyousuke. Her old nemesis has other plans, however, and creeps back from the dead to seek vengeance...
